title: Rome's Colosseum to get $22 million new floor to give tourists a gladiator's view
content:
1. Rome's Colosseum to get $22 million new floor to give tourists a gladiator's view  NBC News

  5. Rome's Colosseum to get new gladiator arena floor  CNN
